verses.verse: בִּשְׁנַת֙ <WH8141> year שְׁתֵּ֣ים <WH8147> both עֶשְׂרֵ֔ה <WH6240> ten לְאָחָ֖ז <WH271> of Ahaz מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king יְהוּדָ֑ה <WH3063> of Judah מָ֠לַךְ <WH4427> to reign הוֹשֵׁ֨עַ <WH1954> began Hoshea בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son אֵלָ֧ה <WH425> of Elah בְשֹׁמְר֛וֹן <WH8111> in Samaria עַל־ <WH5921> over יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> over Israel תֵּ֥שַׁע <WH8672> nine שָׁנִֽים׃ <WH8141> years

וַיַּ֥עַשׂ <WH6213> And he did הָרַ֖ע <WH7451> [that which was] evil בְּעֵינֵ֣י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD רַ֗ק <WH7535> but לֹ֚א <WH3808> not כְּמַלְכֵ֣י <WH4428> but not as the kings יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> who הָי֖וּ <WH1961> become לְפָנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> that were before

עָלָ֣יו <WH5921> against עָלָ֔ה <WH5927> Against him came up שַׁלְמַנְאֶ֖סֶר <WH8022> Shalmaneser מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> king אַשּׁ֑וּר <WH804> of Assyria וַֽיְהִי־ <WH1961> became ל֤וֹ הוֹשֵׁ֙עַ֙ <WH1954> and Hoshea עֶ֔בֶד <WH5650> became his servant וַיָּ֥שֶׁב <WH7725> and gave ל֖וֹ מִנְחָֽה׃ <WH4503> him presents

וַיִּמְצָא֩ <WH4672> found מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> And the king אַשּׁ֨וּר <WH804> of Assyria בְּהוֹשֵׁ֜עַ <WH1954> in Hoshea קֶ֗שֶׁר <WH7195> conspiracy אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> who שָׁלַ֤ח <WH7971> for he had sent מַלְאָכִים֙ <WH4397> messengers אֶל־ <WH413> to ס֣וֹא <WH5471> to So מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וְלֹא־ <WH3808> no הֶעֱלָ֥ה <WH5927> and brought מִנְחָ֛ה <WH4503> no present לְמֶ֥לֶךְ <WH4428> to the king אַשּׁ֖וּר <WH804> of Assyria כְּשָׁנָ֣ה <WH8141> as [he had done] year בְשָׁנָ֑ה <WH8141> by year וַֽיַּעַצְרֵ֙הוּ֙ <WH6113> shut him up מֶ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> therefore the king אַשּׁ֔וּר <WH804> of Assyria וַיַּאַסְרֵ֖הוּ <WH631> and bound בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> court כֶּֽלֶא׃ <WH3608> prison

וַיַּ֥עַל <WH5927> came up מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> Then the king אַשּׁ֖וּר <WH804> of Assyria בְּכָל־ <WH3605> the whole הָאָ֑רֶץ <WH776> throughout all the land וַיַּ֙עַל֙ <WH5927> and went up שֹׁמְר֔וֹן <WH8111> to Samaria וַיָּ֥צַר <WH6696> and besieged עָלֶ֖יהָ <WH5921> and שָׁלֹ֥שׁ <WH7969> it three שָׁנִֽים׃ <WH8141> years

בִּשְׁנַ֨ת <WH8141> year הַתְּשִׁיעִ֜ית <WH8671> In the ninth לְהוֹשֵׁ֗עַ <WH1954> of Hoshea לָכַ֤ד <WH3920> took מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> the king אַשּׁוּר֙ <WH804> of Assyria אֶת־ <WH853> שֹׁ֣מְר֔וֹן <WH8111> Samaria וַיֶּ֥גֶל <WH1540> away אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Israel אַשּׁ֑וּרָה <WH804> into Assyria וַיֹּ֨שֶׁב <WH3427> and placed אֹתָ֜ם <WH853> בַּחְלַ֧ח <WH2477> them in Halah וּבְחָב֛וֹר <WH2249> and in Habor נְהַ֥ר <WH5104> [by] the river גּוֹזָ֖ן <WH1470> of Gozan וְעָרֵ֥י <WH5892> and in the cities מָדָֽי׃ <WH4074> of the Medes פ

וַיְהִ֗י <WH1961> now came כִּֽי־ <WH3588> because חָטְא֤וּ <WH2398> had sinned בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> For [so] it was that the children יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel לַיהוָ֣ה <WH3068> against the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֔ם <WH430> their God הַמַּעֲלֶ֤ה <WH5927> which had brought them up אֹתָם֙ <WH853> מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> out of the land מִצְרַ֔יִם <WH4714> of Egypt מִתַּ֕חַת <WH8478> under יַ֖ד <WH3027> from under the hand פַּרְעֹ֣ה <WH6547> of Pharaoh מֶֽלֶךְ־ <WH4428> king מִצְרָ֑יִם <WH4714> of Egypt וַיִּֽירְא֖וּ <WH3372> and had feared אֱלֹהִ֥ים <WH430> gods אֲחֵרִֽים׃ <WH312> other

וַיֵּֽלְכוּ֙ <WH1980> and walked בְּחֻקּ֣וֹת <WH2708> in the statutes הַגּוֹיִ֔ם <WH1471> of the heathen אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> whom הוֹרִ֣ישׁ <WH3423> cast out יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> whom the LORD מִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> from before בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וּמַלְכֵ֥י <WH4428> and of the kings יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עָשֽׂוּ׃ <WH6213> which they had made

וַיְחַפְּא֣וּ <WH2644> did secretly בְנֵֽי־ <WH1121> And the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> of Israel דְּבָרִים֙ <WH1697> [those] things אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which לֹא־ <WH3808> not כֵ֔ן <WH3651> after that עַל־ <WH5921> against יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> that [were] not right against the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> their God וַיִּבְנ֨וּ <WH1129> and they built לָהֶ֤ם בָּמוֹת֙ <WH1116> them high places בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all עָ֣רֵיהֶ֔ם <WH5892> in all their cities מִמִּגְדַּ֥ל <WH4026> from the tower נוֹצְרִ֖ים <WH5341> of the watchmen עַד־ <WH5704> against עִ֥יר <WH5892> city מִבְצָֽר׃ <WH4013> to the fenced

וַיַּצִּ֧בוּ <WH5324> And they set them up לָהֶ֛ם מַצֵּב֖וֹת <WH4676> images וַאֲשֵׁרִ֑ים <WH842> and groves עַ֚ל <WH5921> on כָּל־ <WH3605> every גִּבְעָ֣ה <WH1389> hill גְבֹהָ֔ה <WH1364> in every high וְתַ֖חַת <WH8478> and under כָּל־ <WH3605> every עֵ֥ץ <WH6086> tree רַעֲנָֽן׃ <WH7488> and under every green

וַיְקַטְּרוּ־ <WH6999> And there they burnt incense שָׁם֙ <WH8033> and there בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all בָּמ֔וֹת <WH1116> in all the high places כַּגּוֹיִ֕ם <WH1471> as [did] the heathen אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> which הֶגְלָ֥ה <WH1540> carried away יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> whom the LORD מִפְּנֵיהֶ֑ם <WH6440> before וַֽיַּעֲשׂוּ֙ <WH6213> them and wrought דְּבָרִ֣ים <WH1697> things רָעִ֔ים <WH7451> wicked לְהַכְעִ֖יס <WH3707> to anger אֶת־ <WH853> יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> to provoke the LORD

וַיַּֽעַבְד֖וּ <WH5647> For they served הַגִּלֻּלִ֑ים <WH1544> idols אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which אָמַ֤ר <WH559> had said יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> whereof the LORD לָהֶ֔ם לֹ֥א <WH3808> shall not תַעֲשׂ֖וּ <WH6213> unto them Ye shall not do אֶת־ <WH853> הַדָּבָ֥ר <WH1697> this thing הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this

וַיָּ֣עַד <WH5749> testified יְהוָ֡ה <WH3068> Yet the LORD בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֣ל <WH3478> against Israel וּבִיהוּדָ֡ה <WH3063> and against Judah בְּיַד֩ <WH3027> by כָּל־ <WH3605> all [נְבִיאֹו כ] (נְבִיאֵ֨י <WH5030> his prophets ק) כָל־ <WH3605> every חֹזֶ֜ה <WH2374> [and by] all the seers לֵאמֹ֗ר <WH559> saying שֻׁ֝֩בוּ <WH7725> Turn מִדַּרְכֵיכֶ֤ם <WH1870> ways הָֽרָעִים֙ <WH7451> ye from your evil וְשִׁמְרוּ֙ <WH8104> and keep מִצְוֹתַ֣י <WH4687> my commandments חֻקּוֹתַ֔י <WH2708> [and] my statutes כְּכָ֨ל־ <WH3605> to all הַתּוֹרָ֔ה <WH8451> according to all the law אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which צִוִּ֖יתִי <WH6680> which I commanded אֶת־ <WH853> אֲבֹֽתֵיכֶ֑ם <WH1> your fathers וַֽאֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> and which שָׁלַ֣חְתִּי <WH7971> and which I sent אֲלֵיכֶ֔ם <WH413> to you בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> to you by עֲבָדַ֥י <WH5650> my servants הַנְּבִיאִֽים׃ <WH5030> all the prophets

וְלֹ֖א <WH3808> did not שָׁמֵ֑עוּ <WH8085> Notwithstanding they would not hear וַיַּקְשׁ֤וּ <WH7185> but hardened אֶת־ <WH853> עָרְפָּם֙ <WH6203> their necks כְּעֹ֣רֶף <WH6203> like to the neck אֲבוֹתָ֔ם <WH1> of their fathers אֲשֶׁר֙ <WH834> who לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not הֶאֱמִ֔ינוּ <WH539> that did not believe בַּֽיהוָ֖ה <WH3068> in the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶֽם׃ <WH430> their God

וַיִּמְאֲס֣וּ <WH3988> And they rejected אֶת־ <WH853> חֻקָּ֗יו <WH2706> his statutes וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּרִיתוֹ֙ <WH1285> and his covenant אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which כָּרַ֣ת <WH3772> that he made אֶת־ <WH854> with אֲבוֹתָ֔ם <WH1> with their fathers וְאֵת֙ <WH853> עֵֽדְוֹתָ֔יו <WH5715> and his testimonies אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which הֵעִ֖יד <WH5749> which he testified בָּ֑ם וַיֵּ֨לְכוּ֜ <WH1980> along אַחֲרֵ֤י <WH310> and went after הַהֶ֙בֶל֙ <WH1892> vanity וַיֶּהְבָּ֔לוּ <WH1891> and became vain וְאַחֲרֵ֤י <WH310> and after הַגּוֹיִם֙ <WH1471> the heathen אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which סְבִֽיבֹתָ֔ם <WH5439> that [were] round about אֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> which צִוָּ֤ה <WH6680> had charged יְהוָה֙ <WH3068> them [concerning] whom the LORD אֹתָ֔ם <WH853> לְבִלְתִּ֖י <WH1115> not עֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> them that they should not do כָּהֶֽם׃

וַיַּעַזְב֗וּ <WH5800> And they left אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all מִצְוֹת֙ <WH4687> all the commandments יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֔ם <WH430> their God וַיַּעֲשׂ֥וּ <WH6213> and made לָהֶ֛ם מַסֵּכָ֖ה <WH4541> them molten images [שְׁנֵים כ] (שְׁנֵ֣י <WH8147> both ק) עֲגָלִ֑ים <WH5695> calves וַיַּעֲשׂ֣וּ <WH6213> and made אֲשֵׁירָ֗ה <WH842> a grove וַיִּֽשְׁתַּחֲווּ֙ <WH7812> and worshipped לְכָל־ <WH3605> all צְבָ֣א <WH6635> all the host הַשָּׁמַ֔יִם <WH8064> of heaven וַיַּעַבְד֖וּ <WH5647> and served אֶת־ <WH853> הַבָּֽעַל׃ <WH1168> Baal

וַֽ֠יַּעֲבִירוּ <WH5674> to pass אֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֵיהֶ֤ם <WH1121> And they caused their sons וְאֶת־ <WH853> בְּנֽוֹתֵיהֶם֙ <WH1323> and their daughters בָּאֵ֔שׁ <WH784> through the fire וַיִּקְסְמ֥וּ <WH7080> and used קְסָמִ֖ים <WH7081> divination וַיְנַחֵ֑שׁוּ <WH5172> and enchantments וַיִּֽתְמַכְּר֗וּ <WH4376> and sold לַעֲשׂ֥וֹת <WH6213> themselves to do הָרַ֛ע <WH7451> evil בְּעֵינֵ֥י <WH5869> in the sight יְהוָ֖ה <WH3068> of the LORD לְהַכְעִיסֽוֹ׃ <WH3707> to provoke him to anger

וַיִּתְאַנַּ֨ף <WH599> angry יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Therefore the LORD מְאֹד֙ <WH3966> was very בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> with Israel וַיְסִרֵ֖ם <WH5493> and removed מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> from פָּנָ֑יו <WH6440> them out of his sight לֹ֣א <WH3808> none נִשְׁאַ֔ר <WH7604> there was none left רַ֛ק <WH7535> but שֵׁ֥בֶט <WH7626> but the tribe יְהוּדָ֖ה <WH3063> of Judah לְבַדּֽוֹ׃ <WH905> alone

גַּם־ <WH1571> Also יְהוּדָ֕ה <WH3063> Also Judah לֹ֣א <WH3808> did not שָׁמַ֔ר <WH8104> kept אֶת־ <WH853> מִצְוֹ֖ת <WH4687> not the commandments יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> of the LORD אֱלֹהֵיהֶ֑ם <WH430> their God וַיֵּ֣לְכ֔וּ <WH1980> walked בְּחֻקּ֥וֹת <WH2708> in the statutes יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> of Israel אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> which עָשֽׂוּ׃ <WH6213> which they made

וַיִּמְאַ֨ס <WH3988> rejected יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> And the LORD בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all זֶ֤רַע <WH2233> all the seed יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> of Israel וַיְעַנֵּ֔ם <WH6031> and afflicted וַֽיִּתְּנֵ֖ם <WH5414> them and delivered בְּיַד־ <WH3027> them into the hand שֹׁסִ֑ים <WH8154> of spoilers עַ֛ד <WH5704> against אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> he הִשְׁלִיכָ֖ם <WH7993> until he had cast מִפָּנָֽיו׃ <WH6440> them out of his sight

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> When קָרַ֣ע <WH7167> For he rent יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Israel מֵעַל֙ <WH5921> from בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> from the house דָּוִ֔ד <WH1732> of David וַיַּמְלִ֖יכוּ <WH4427> king אֶת־ <WH853> יָרָבְעָ֣ם <WH3379> and they made Jeroboam בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son נְבָ֑ט <WH5028> of Nebat [וַיַּדֵּא כ] (וַיַּדַּ֨ח <WH5077> cast out ק) יָרָבְעָ֤ם <WH3379> and Jeroboam אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Israel מֵאַחֲרֵ֣י <WH310> from following יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> the LORD וְהֶחֱטֵיאָ֖ם <WH2398> and made them sin חֲטָאָ֥ה <WH2401> sin גְדוֹלָֽה׃ <WH1419> a great

וַיֵּֽלְכוּ֙ <WH1980> walked בְּנֵ֣י <WH1121> For the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <WH3478> of Israel בְּכָל־ <WH3605> all חַטֹּ֥אות <WH2403> in all the sins יָרָבְעָ֖ם <WH3379> of Jeroboam אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which עָשָׂ֑ה <WH6213> which he did לֹא־ <WH3808> did not סָ֖רוּ <WH5493> they departed מִמֶּֽנָּה׃ <WH4480> at

עַ֠ד <WH5704> until אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after הֵסִ֨יר <WH5493> removed יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Until the LORD אֶת־ <WH853> יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Israel מֵעַ֣ל <WH5921> from פָּנָ֔יו <WH6440> out of his sight כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> he דִּבֶּ֔ר <WH1696> as he had said בְּיַ֖ד <WH3027> by כָּל־ <WH3605> all עֲבָדָ֣יו <WH5650> all his servants הַנְּבִיאִ֑ים <WH5030> the prophets וַיִּ֨גֶל <WH1540> carried away יִשְׂרָאֵ֜ל <WH3478> So was Israel מֵעַ֤ל <WH5921> their own אַדְמָתוֹ֙ <WH127> out of their own land אַשּׁ֔וּרָה <WH804> to Assyria עַ֖ד <WH5704> until הַיּ֥וֹם <WH3117> unto this day הַזֶּֽה׃ <WH2088> this פ
